Name: 75 Cocktail (Vermeire's 1922 recipe)
Ingredients: 20 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Spirituous, dry and fruity, the botanicals in the gin add depth of flavour to the other fruity ingredients.
History: Adapted from a recipe by Henry Tépé of Henry's Bar in Paris, France, originally published in Robert Vermeire's 1922 book Cocktails - How to Mix Them .
Nutrition: One serving of 75 Cocktail (Vermeire's 1922 recipe) contains 160 calories
